course.subject: RMBI
course.name: Risk Management and Business Intelligence Capstone Project I
course.description: Student conducts an in-depth study on selected topics in Risk Management and Business Intelligence under the supervision of a faculty. Scope may include the identification of a non-reference problem, followed by subsequent analysis and solution of the problem. Creative and critical thinking in the decision processes made under uncertainty are expected to be demonstrated in the project.
course.prerequisites: COMP 4331 OR ISOM 3360
